data.title: Haircut
data.description: Get a trendy haircut at our barbershop. Our skilled barbers will give you a fresh and stylish look. With a 4.6-star rating, our haircut service is offered at a special discounted price of $22. Don't miss our 12% discount offer.

data.title: Beard Trim
data.description: Experience professional beard trimming services at our barbershop. Our expert barbers will give your beard a precise and neat trim. With a 4.8-star rating, our beard trim service is available at a special discounted price of $12. Take advantage of our 20% discount offer.

data.title: Hairstyling
data.description: Enjoy professional hairstyling for all hair types and lengths at our barbershop. Our skilled stylists will create the perfect style for you. With a 4.9-star rating, our hairstyling service is available at a special discounted price of $27. Don't miss our 10% discount offer.

data.title: Shave
data.description: Experience a traditional close shave at our barbershop. Our skilled barbers provide a close and comfortable shaving experience. With a 4.7-star rating, our shave service is available at a special discounted price of $15. Take advantage of our 17% discount offer.

data.title: Kids Haircut
data.description: Treat your kids to child-friendly haircuts at our barbershop. Our barbers are skilled at making kids feel comfortable and look great. With a 4.6-star rating, our kids' haircut service is available at a special discounted price of $12. Take advantage of our 20% discount offer.
